name: The Next Level
description:
This game is a submission to the Brackeys Game Jam #2 (February, 2019)

The theme is "Love is Blind"

The Next Level is a classic 2D Space Shooter game. But it has a little (and strange) story integrated into it :) 

Please note that this is not a finished game. There is no audio (music / sfx) at the moment. There might be glitches as well. But fell free to play and provide feedback!

Engine: Unity 2018.3 (with Text Mesh Pro)

Art: Clip Studio Paint

Font: "Permanent Marker"  by "Font Diner", downloaded from Google Fonts (under Apache Licence, version 2.0)
